reviewText: Find out why it is that most racing enthusiasts will not watch the parade that is Formula 1 today. Here in these videos we can see the TRUE nature of  competitive driving. The Turbo era, the mammoth horsepower that propelled  these machines to the limit. The true champions of Formula 1 such as  *Ayrton Senna*, Nelson Piquet, Nigel Mansell, and Alain Prost. See what it  is that we as true Formula 1 fans miss the most. You won't be dissapointed.
